UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The effects of tryptophan and hydrophobicity on the structure and bioactivity of novel indolicidin derivatives with promising pharmaceutical potential.
Literature.Author: Podorieszach AP, Huttunen-Hennelly HE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=200µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=40µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=20µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=0.002µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=20µg/ml)
